pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, December 4, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Hertfordshire, United Kingdom

8:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at The Grove Hotel.

Amber Hotel Entrance
The Grove Hotel
Chandler's Cross

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Norway, Erna Solberg.

The Grove Hotel
Chandler's Cross

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

9:05 a.m. The Prime Minister will be greeted by the Secretary General of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization, Jens Stoltenberg, and the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson.

Ground Floor
The Grove Hotel
Chandler's Cross

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

9:35 a.m. The Prime Minister will take part in the Leaders Family Photo.

Ground Floor
The Grove Hotel
Chandler's Cross

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a ceremony to mark the 70th anniversary of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization.

Ground Floor
The Grove Hotel
Chandler's Cross

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the North Atlantic Council meeting.

Plenary Room, Ground Floor
The Grove Hotel
Chandler's Cross

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage for opening remarks

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Spain, Pedro Sánchez.

The Grove Hotel
Chandler's Cross

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of the Netherlands, Mark Rutte.

The Grove Hotel
Chandler's Cross

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

PR 4 Room, Ground Floor
The Grove Hotel
Chandler's Cross

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Ottawa.

Closed to media.
